common: Concurrent cardiovascular meds, vasodilatory agents, or CNS depressants

description.common:
hawthorn, vandetanib.
Either increases toxicity of the other by QTc interval. Avoid or Use Alternate Drug. Avoid coadministration with drugs known to prolong QT interval;  if a drug known to prolong QT interval must be used, more frequent ECG monitoring is recommended.
hawthorn increases effects of acebutolol by pharmacodynamic synergism. Use Caution/Monitor.
hawthorn increases effects of adenosine by pharmacodynamic synergism. Use Caution/Monitor.
hawthorn increases effects of amiodarone by pharmacodynamic synergism. Use Caution/Monitor.
hawthorn increases effects of amobarbital by pharmacodynamic synergism. Use Caution/Monitor. May enhance CNS depression.
hawthorn increases effects of azelastine by pharmacodynamic synergism. Use Caution/Monitor. May enhance CNS depression.
hawthorn increases effects of brompheniramine by pharmacodynamic synergism. Use Caution/Monitor. May enhance CNS depression.
hawthorn increases effects of butabarbital by pharmacodynamic synergism. Use Caution/Monitor. May enhance CNS depression.
hawthorn increases effects of butalbital by pharmacodynamic synergism. Use Caution/Monitor. May enhance CNS depression.
hawthorn increases effects of carbinoxamine by pharmacodynamic synergism. Use Caution/Monitor. May enhance CNS depression.
hawthorn increases effects of chloral hydrate by pharmacodynamic synergism. Use Caution/Monitor. May enhance CNS depression.
hawthorn increases effects of chlorpheniramine by pharmacodynamic synergism. Use Caution/Monitor. May enhance CNS depression.
hawthorn increases effects of cinnarizine by pharmacodynamic synergism. Use Caution/Monitor. May enhance CNS depression.
hawthorn increases effects of clemastine by pharmacodynamic synergism. Use Caution/Monitor. May enhance CNS depression.
crizotinib and hawthorn both increase  QTc interval. Use Caution/Monitor. ECG monitoring is recommended, along with drugs that may prolong the QT interval.
hawthorn increases effects of cyclizine by pharmacodynamic synergism. Use Caution/Monitor. May enhance CNS depression.
hawthorn increases effects of cyproheptadine by pharmacodynamic synergism. Use Caution/Monitor. May enhance CNS depression.
hawthorn increases effects of dexchlorpheniramine by pharmacodynamic synergism. Use Caution/Monitor. May enhance CNS depression.
hawthorn increases effects of dexmedetomidine by pharmacodynamic synergism. Use Caution/Monitor. May enhance CNS depression.
hawthorn increases effects of digoxin by pharmacodynamic synergism. Use Caution/Monitor.
hawthorn increases effects of diltiazem by pharmacodynamic synergism. Use Caution/Monitor.
hawthorn increases effects of dimenhydrinate by pharmacodynamic synergism. Use Caution/Monitor. May enhance CNS depression.
hawthorn increases effects of diphenhydramine by pharmacodynamic synergism. Use Caution/Monitor. May enhance CNS depression.
hawthorn increases effects of disopyramide by pharmacodynamic synergism. Use Caution/Monitor.
hawthorn increases effects of doxylamine by pharmacodynamic synergism. Use Caution/Monitor. May enhance CNS depression.
hawthorn increases effects of encainide by pharmacodynamic synergism. Use Caution/Monitor.
hawthorn increases effects of esmolol by pharmacodynamic synergism. Use Caution/Monitor.
hawthorn increases effects of flecainide by pharmacodynamic synergism. Use Caution/Monitor.
hawthorn increases effects of hydroxyzine by pharmacodynamic synergism. Use Caution/Monitor. May enhance CNS depression.
hawthorn increases effects of ibutilide by pharmacodynamic synergism. Use Caution/Monitor.
indacaterol, inhaled, hawthorn. QTc interval. Use Caution/Monitor. Drugs that are known to prolong the QTc interval may have an increased the risk of ventricular arrhythmias.
hawthorn increases effects of lidocaine by pharmacodynamic synergism. Use Caution/Monitor.
hawthorn increases effects of mexiletine by pharmacodynamic synergism. Use Caution/Monitor.

hawthorn and olodaterol inhaled both increase  QTc interval. Use Caution/Monitor. Drugs that prolong the QTc interval and may potentiate the effects of beta2 agonists on the cardiovascular system; increased risk of ventricular arrhythmias
hawthorn increases effects of pentobarbital by pharmacodynamic synergism. Use Caution/Monitor. May enhance CNS depression.
hawthorn increases effects of phenobarbital by pharmacodynamic synergism. Use Caution/Monitor. May enhance CNS depression.
hawthorn increases effects of phenytoin by pharmacodynamic synergism. Use Caution/Monitor.
hawthorn increases effects of primidone by pharmacodynamic synergism. Use Caution/Monitor. May enhance CNS depression.
hawthorn increases effects of procainamide by pharmacodynamic synergism. Use Caution/Monitor.
hawthorn increases effects of promethazine by pharmacodynamic synergism. Use Caution/Monitor. May enhance CNS depression.
hawthorn increases effects of propafenone by pharmacodynamic synergism. Use Caution/Monitor.
hawthorn increases effects of propranolol by pharmacodynamic synergism. Use Caution/Monitor.

quetiapine, hawthorn.
Either increases toxicity of the other by QTc interval. Use Caution/Monitor. Avoid use with drugs that prolong QT and in patients with risk factors for prolonged QT interval. Postmarketing cases show QT prolongation with overdose in patients with concomitant illness or with drugs known to cause electrolyte imbalance or prolong QT.
hawthorn increases effects of quinidine by pharmacodynamic synergism. Use Caution/Monitor.
hawthorn increases effects of secobarbital by pharmacodynamic synergism. Use Caution/Monitor. May enhance CNS depression.
hawthorn increases effects of sotalol by pharmacodynamic synergism. Use Caution/Monitor.
hawthorn increases effects of triclofos by pharmacodynamic synergism. Use Caution/Monitor. May enhance CNS depression.
hawthorn increases effects of triprolidine by pharmacodynamic synergism. Use Caution/Monitor. May enhance CNS depression.
hawthorn increases effects of verapamil by pharmacodynamic synergism. Use Caution/Monitor.
